title: Tommy Fury branded a 'diva' for ditching PA as he 'didn't want to travel to Plymouth'
text:

Tommy Fury has been branded a diva after cancelling a PA because he "didn't want to travel to Plymouth."

Boxer Tommy incensed fans after ditching his Fever & Boutique appearance just hours before he was due on stage.

He later was seen at Shocktober Fest in Crawley with girlfriend Molly Mae, a move which wound fans up even more.

Just hours before Manchester based Tommy was due on stage, a spokesperson for the nightclub wrote on Facebook that Tyson Fury's brother "decided that he doesn't want to make the journey down to Plymouth" so scrapped his planned PA.

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

The event was sold out online and nightclub bosses said they were "absolutely gutted" by the no show.

Despite the cancellation, Fever & Boutique did manage to lure Love Island alumni, Sam Bird, to carry out a DJ set at 1am.

The club's Facebook post continued: "Tommy’s management company confirmed on Wednesday that he would be making an appearance tonight but earlier today he decided that he doesn’t want to make the journey down to Plymouth.

(Image: Google Streetview)

(Image: Hewitt / SplashNews.com)

"We are absolutely gutted and we've been frantically trying to sort a replacement out and our friend Sam Bird has kindly offered to step in with a DJ set and PA to keep the party going!

"We are so sorry to let everyone down and even though it is completely out of our control we will be offering all ticket holders a free drink tonight & for those wanting to come down and see Sam tonight we still have tickets available on the door."

(Image: samrobertbird/Instagram)

One fan reacted badly, writing on Facebook: "Literally just got a spray tan to see Tommy. Literally FURYious."

Another raged: "He doesn't want to make the journey to Plymouth? Diva!"
description: Instead Tommy Fury went on a date with girlfriend Molly Mae... In Crawley
